sentences.en: an Irish folk song
sentences.cn: 一首爱尔兰民歌

sentences.en: City dwellers think country folk have provincial attitudes.
sentences.cn: 城里人以为乡下人思想迂腐.

sentences.en: Difficulties help to forge people into able folk.
sentences.cn: 困难有助于把人们锻炼成能干的人.

sentences.en: Folk art covers a wide range.
sentences.cn: 民间艺术包罗甚广.

sentences.en: folk tales
sentences.cn: 民间故事

sentences.en: For an encore, he sang an unaccompanied folk song.
sentences.cn: 应观众再唱一曲的要求, 他清唱了一首民歌.

sentences.en: He has a taste for folk songs.
sentences.cn: 他喜欢民歌.

sentences.en: He quavered out folk songs.
sentences.cn: 他以颤声演唱了民歌.

sentences.en: I am not very fond of folk dance.
sentences.cn: 我不太喜欢民间舞蹈.

sentences.en: I don't know what those folk think they are playing at.
sentences.cn: 真不知道那些家伙在搞什么鬼。

sentences.en: I'd like a job working with old folk or kids.
sentences.cn: 我喜欢与老人或小孩打交道的工作。

sentences.en: I’m sure there are some folk who would rather they weren’t here.
sentences.cn: 我敢肯定有些人宁愿自己不在这里。

sentences.en: Is it OK if I call my folks?
sentences.cn: 我打电话给家里人可以吗？

sentences.en: Jack was a folk hero in the Greenwich Village bars.
sentences.cn: 在格林尼治村的酒吧里杰克是人们心目中的英雄。

sentences.en: Most of the people on the island are fishery folk.
sentences.cn: 那个岛上的居民大部分是渔民.

sentences.en: She is humming a folk song that I never heard before.
sentences.cn: 她在哼一首我以前从未听过的民歌.

sentences.en: She struck up a folk melody on the piano.
sentences.cn: 她开始用钢琴演奏那首民歌.

sentences.en: Thanks to the folks at NBC.
sentences.cn: 感谢全国广播公司的工作人员。

sentences.en: The 2012 Nobel Prize in Literature was awarded to Mo Yan"who with hallucinatory realism merges folk tales, history and the contemporary".
sentences.cn: 2012年诺贝尔文学奖得主为莫言，他“很好地将魔幻现实与民间故事、历史与当代结合在一起”。

sentences.en: The word "volk" translates literally as "folk"
sentences.cn: volk这个单词直译过来为folk（人们）。

sentences.en: Wait till the folks back home hear about this!
sentences.cn: 等到家乡的人听说这事吧！

words.tran_cn: 有民间风味的；和气的；无拘束的

phrases.tran_cn: n. 民歌手；民歌演唱者

trans.tran_cn: 民俗的，大众的，普通百姓的
trans.tran_en: folk art, stories, customs etc are traditional and typical of the ordinary people who live in a particular area

trans.tran_cn: 人们，亲人，大伙儿，民间音乐
